sql.i: SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.FFBM,FW.FFR,TO_CHAR(FW.FFSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FFSJ,FW.SYR,FW.SSBM,TO_CHAR(FW.LYRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LYRQ,FW.CFDD,FW.YT,TO_CHAR(FW.CJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJRQ, FW.BZ,FW.SQQRZT,FW.SYRID,FW.FFRID,FW.ZLWZ,FW.WBSYDW,FW.SYFX, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM gdzc_bgyplf fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.SYR,FW.SYRBM,FW.JJR,FW.JJRBM,TO_CHAR(FW.JJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD ') AS JJSJ,FW.JJYY,TO_CHAR(FW.CJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJRQ,FW.BZ,FW.JJRID, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM gdzc_zcjj fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.SQBM,FW.BZRS,FW.SBMC,FW.GZSL,FW.TLSBSL,FW.GMXH,FW.YT,FW.SQLY, TO_CHAR(FW.CJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJRQ,FW.SQR,FW.SQRID, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM GDZC_SBCG fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.SQBM,FW.BFLY, TO_CHAR(FW.CJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJRQ,FW.SQR,FW.SQRID, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM GDZC_WSBF fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.WCQJSQ_ID,FW.BH,FW.TBRID,FW.TBRXM,FW.SSDWID,FW.SSDWMC, TO_CHAR(FW.TBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TBRQ,FW.RYZT,FW.WCDD,FW.WCSY, TO_CHAR(FW.WCSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WCSJ,TO_CHAR(FW.JHFHSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS JHFHSJ, FW.SPZT,FW.CDZT, TO_CHAR(FW.CJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJSJ,FW.GZZCR, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM QXJ_WCQJSQ fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.WCQJSQ_ID,FW.BH,FW.TBRID,FW.TBRXM,FW.SSDWID,FW.SSDWMC,FW.WCXJSQ_ID, TO_CHAR(FW.TBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TBRQ,FW.RYZT,FW.WCDD,FW.WCSY, TO_CHAR(FW.WCSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WCSJ,TO_CHAR(FW.SJFHSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SJFHSJ, FW.SPZT,FW.CDZT, TO_CHAR(FW.CJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJSJ,FW.GZZCR, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM QXJ_WCXJSQ fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.HYBMD_ID,FW.HYGL_ID,FW.TBRID,FW.TBR,FW.QJSY,FW.SPZT,FW.TBRDW, TO_CHAR(FW.TBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TBRQ, TO_CHAR(FW.CJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJSJ, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM HY_BMD fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.GZSW_ID,FW.GZZT,FW.NR,FW.BLQK, TO_CHAR(FW.JBSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS JBSJ, TO_CHAR(FW.CJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJSJ, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM RCBG_GZSW fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.CCSQ_ID,FW.BH,FW.TBRID,FW.TBRXM,FW.SSDWID,FW.SSDWMC,FW.QXCC_ID, TO_CHAR(FW.TBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TBRQ,FW.RYZT,FW.WCDD,FW.WCSY, TO_CHAR(FW.WCSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WCSJ,TO_CHAR(FW.SJFHSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SJFHSJ, FW.SPZT,FW.CDZT, TO_CHAR(FW.CJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJSJ,FW.GZZCR, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM CC_QXCC fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc

SELECT FW.WJBM,FW.CCSQ_ID,FW.BH,FW.TBRID,FW.TBRXM,FW.SSDWID,FW.SSDWMC, TO_CHAR(FW.TBRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TBRQ,FW.RYZT,FW.WCDD,FW.WCSY,"huadi/src/cn/com/huadi/aos/hdoa/unit/plugin" TO_CHAR(FW.WCSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WCSJ,TO_CHAR(FW.JHFHSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS JHFHSJ, FW.SPZT,FW.CDZT, TO_CHAR(FW.CJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CJSJ,FW.GZZCR, FZXX.WJXS_ID,FZXX.SSDWID,FZXX.WJLX,FZXX.BT,FZXX.MJ,FZXX.BMQX,FZXX.QXLB,FZXX.JJCD,FZXX.ZH,FZXX.NH, FZXX.XH,FZXX.HZ,FZXX.WHXSGZ,FZXX.LLR,FZXX.LLR_ID,TO_CHAR(FZXX.LRSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LRSJ,FZXX.LRBM,FZXX.LRBM_ID,FZXX.LRDW,FZXX.LRDW_ID,FZXX.NBYJ, FZXX.ZT,FZXX.ZTR,TO_CHAR(FZXX.ZTSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZTSJ,WJXS.WJXS, N.N_ID,N.FI_ID,N.N_UPERID,N.N_SUBSYSID,N.FI_CLASS,N.FI_OBJECTID,N.N_FR_ID,N.N_FR_NAME,N.N_SEND_UNIT, N.N_SENDER,N.N_SENDER_ID,TO_CHAR(N.N_SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_SEND_DATE,N.N_EXECUTOR, N.N_EXECUTORNAME,N.N_FACT_EXECUTOR,N.N_STATUS,TO_CHAR(N.N_FINISH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_FINISH_DATE,N.N_LY,N.N_YDBZ,N.N_ISWORK,N.N_DBYXJ,TO_CHAR(N.N_YD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS N_YD_TIME, N.N_FFRECID,N.N_LYS,N.N_DB,N.N_ISZHONGDIAN,N.N_PX FROM CC_CCSQ fw,gw_fzxx fzxx,gw_wjxs wjxs,gzl_node n WHERE fw.wjbm = fzxx.wjbm and wjxs.wjxs_id=fzxx.wjxs_id and n.fi_objectid=fw.wjbm AND fw.wjbm=? order by n.n_id desc
